general_advisory: Farmers are advised to conduct harvesting, sowing, and spraying operations accordingly. Farmers should take care of crops, animals, and complete sowing of Rabi crops. Minimum temperatures are expected to vary across regions.

advisory: There is some rainfall expected in the upcoming days, so farmers are advised to wait for harvesting operations and ensure safe storage of paddy crops.
Use 'Super Grain Bag' or proper bagging and stacking methods for safe storage of harvested paddy.
Regular monitoring against insect attack is advised due to past weather conditions.
Use recommended insecticides and traps for insect control.
Wait for irrigation and spraying operations due to expected rainfall.
Use straw as mulching material to maintain soil moisture and temperature.
Monitor for Diamond back moth attack and use pheromone traps if necessary.
Spray neem oil or Emamectin Benzoate after rain if attack is observed.
Protect animals from cold using jute bags and straw as bedding material.
Provide clean drinking water and keep sheds clean to prevent flies.
Vaccinate and deworm animals to control diseases and worms.
Ensure proper ventilation in poultry houses.
Use external heat sources to maintain warmth.
Maintain suitable drinking water temperature for poultry.
